title: Executive Order 6593-Authorizing the Beet Sugar Committee to Accept the Voluntary Services of W. Lewis Abbott
content: By virtue of and pursuant to authority vested in me under title I of the National Industrial Recovery Act of June 16, 1933 (ch. 90, 48 Stat. 195), I hereby authorize the Beet Sugar Committee appointed by the Secretary of Labor pursuant to my authorization of October 27, 1933, to accept and utilize the voluntary and uncompensated services of Professor W. Lewis Abbott.
citation: Franklin D. Roosevelt, Executive Order 6593-Authorizing the Beet Sugar Committee to Accept the Voluntary Services of W. Lewis Abbott Online by Gerhard Peters and John T. Woolley, The American Presidency Project https://www.presidency.ucsb.edu/node/362351
